xwikidoc.name: NavigationConfigurationClass
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.SvenHoyer
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.SvenHoyer

excludeTopLevelExtensionPages.hint: This dynamic filter removes from the navigation tree the top level pages that belong to an installed extension, if they are not meant to be modified.
excludeTopLevelExtensionPages.name: excludeTopLevelExtensionPages

exclusions.hint: The list of pages to exclude from the navigation tree.
exclusions.name: exclusions
exclusions.sql: select doc.fullName, space.name from XWikiDocument doc, XWikiSpace space where doc.space = space.reference and space.parent is null and doc.translation = 0 and doc.name = 'WebHome' order by space.name

inclusions.hint: The list of pages to include in the navigation tree even if they were excluded by a previous filter.
inclusions.name: inclusions
inclusions.sql: select doc.fullName, space.name from XWikiDocument doc, XWikiSpace space where doc.space = space.reference and space.parent is null and doc.translation = 0 and doc.name = 'WebHome' order by space.name
